body: This deceptively complex weapon appears as nothing more than a 12-foot rope with a 6-inch-long, conical metal spike. Similar to a meteor hammer, it can be whirled at great speeds, then aimed to strike and pierce opponents with great reach. Once it strikes, the wielder can quickly retrieve the weapon with a tug of the rope.
name: Rope Dart
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Rope Dart
